metadata.name: HODL Like a Hero / HODL Until Zero
metadata.description:
Zero is the magic number for many things in life. As the crypto world continues to evolve, so too do the strategies and techniques investors use. One phenomenon that has emerged in recent years is the rise of the NFT holder.

This strategy requires a great deal of patience and discipline, as it can often take months or even years for an NFT to appreciate in value. However, those who are successful with this approach can reap substantial rewards.

Holding an NFT can be like a roller coaster ride. The value of your tokens can go up and down, and it can be tempting to sell when the value is high. However, if you sell too soon, you may miss out on even bigger gains. That's why it's important to hold onto your NFTs even at risk until the value reaches zero.

It may seem counterintuitive. You need to be prepared to hold your NFTs for extended periods of time. This strategy is not for those who are looking for quick profits; it's for those who are willing to play the long game. So, next time you're thinking about selling your NFTs. Remember to hold like a hero or wait until the value reaches zero.
